Title: An Act Changing the Name of the Patnongon Central School in the Municipality of Patnongon, Province of Antique, to Colonel Ruperto Abellon Memorial School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 488
An Act Changing the Name of the Patnongon Central School in the Municipality of Patnongon, Province of Antique, to Colonel Ruperto Abellon Memorial School
Section 1. The name of Patnongon Central School in the Municipality of Patnongon, Province of Antique, is changed to Colonel Ruperto Abellon Memorial School.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 10, 1983
